cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP data port to 99999 exceeds the valid port range, causing SCTP connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting downlink carrier bandwidth to 300 PRBs exceeds the valid range for the band, causing configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波頻寬設定為 300 PRB 超過該頻段的有效範圍，會導致配置失敗。
